title: Pfizer, Moderna COVID-19 Vaccines Less Effective in Immunocompromised People, But Help Avoid Hospitalization
author: Jamie DePolo
description: The Pfizer and Moderna COVID-19 vaccines help keep people with weakened immune systems out of the hospital if they are infected.
